name: The Garlic Truffle Ramen
description:
A blend of creamy pork and vegetable broth, garlic, truffle oil, kale, mushrooms, black pepper, seaweed and seasoned egg. 

 Served with thick noodles. (Contains Dairy)

name: The Shoyu on Fire Ramen
description: Spicy clear chicken broth with shoyu, green onion, corn, seaweed, jalapeno, micro cilantro, lime and seasoned egg. Choice of Pork, Chicken, or Tofu.
